title: Crafting the Holy Objects
summary: Exodus 37 describes Bezalel making the Ark of the Covenant, the table for the bread of the Presence, the golden lampstand, and the altar of incense, all according to Godâ€™s exact instructions.

faq.question: Who made the sacred furnishings?
faq.answer: Bezalel, filled with the Spirit of God and skill in craftsmanship.

faq.question: What was the purpose of these objects?
faq.answer: To serve in the worship and presence of God within the tabernacle.
